kDesc

The complete Heavy Skull Armour Set, this bundle contains all five parts that make up the full Heavy Skull Armour Set: 
 
 1. Heavy Skull - Heavy Combat Body Armour 
 2. Heavy Skull - Heavy Combat Boots 
 3. Heavy Skull - Heavy Combat Gloves 
 4. Heavy Skull - Heavy Combat Helmet 
 5. Heavy Skull - Heavy Combat Leg Armour [#Legal]

L'ensemble complet Armure lourde Heavy Skull, avec les cinq éléments composant l'ensemble Armure Heavy Skull complet : 
 
 1. Heavy Skull - Gilet de combat lourd 
 2. Heavy Skull - Bottes de combat lourdes 
 3. Heavy Skull - Gants de combat lourds 
 4. Heavy Skull - Casque de combat lourd 
 5. Heavy Skull - Jambières de combat lourdes [#Legal]

Das komplette mittelschwere Rüstungsset Heavy Skull; dieses Bündel enthält alle fünf Bestandteile der kompletten Heavy Skull-Rüstung: 
 
 1. Heavy Skull - Panzerweste für schwere Kämpfe 
 2. Heavy Skull - Stiefel für schwere Kämpfe 
 3. Heavy Skull - Handschuhe für schwere Kämpfe 
 4. Heavy Skull - Helm für schwere Kämpfe 
 5. Heavy Skull - Beinrüstung für schwere Kämpfe [#Legal]

Set completo di armatura pesante Heavy Skull, contiene i cinque componenti che compongono l'intero set di armatura Heavy Skull: 
 
 1. Heavy Skull - armatura per il corpo da combattimento pesante 
 2. Heavy Skull - stivali da combattimento pesante 
 3. Heavy Skull - guanti da combattimento pesante 
 4. Heavy Skull - casco da combattimento pesante 
 5. Heavy Skull - armatura per le gambe da combattimento pesante [#Legal]

El set completo de armadura Heavy Skull, contiene las cinco partes que componen la armadura: 
 
 1. Heavy Skull - Armadura corporal de combate pesada 
 2. Heavy Skull - Botas de combate pesadas 
 3. Heavy Skull - Guantes de combate pesados 
 4. Heavy Skull - Casco de combate pesado 
 5. Heavy Skull - Armadura de combate pesada para pierna [#Legal]

완전한 무거운 해골 강화 방어구 세트입니다. 무거운 해골 방어구 세트를 완성하는 다섯 개의 아이템으로 구성되어 있습니다:
 
 1. 무거운 해골 - 강화 전투 상체방어구 (여성)

 3. 무거운 해골 - 강화 전투장갑 (여성)
 4. 무거운 해골 - 강화 전투헬멧 (여성)
 5. 무거운 해골 - 강화 전투 하체방어구 (여성) [#Legal]
